alert.note: Alert for Alger; Delta; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 2:55PM EST until February 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches with localized higher amounts. Snow amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected near the Bay of Green Bay in Delta County. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph late tonight and early Tuesday morning...especially near Lake Superior. * WHERE...Alger, Luce, Delta, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the commute Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Alger; Delta; Luce; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft
